Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> Takes Place, <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3860><s%> Is Delivered Up <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Be Crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Were Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders <S%G4245><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People <S%G2992><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Court <S%G833><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> High Priest <S%G749><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was Called <S%G3004><s%> Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Took Counsel Together <S%G4823><s%> In Order That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> They Might Seize <S%G2902><s%> By Guile, <S%G1388><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Kill Him; <S%G615><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> But They Said, <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> During <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Feast, <S%G1859><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> A Tumult <S%G2351><s%> There Be <S%G1096><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Now Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Being <S%G1096><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of Simon <S%G4613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Leper, <S%G3015><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Seeing It <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Became Indignant, <S%G23><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G684><s%> This Waste? <S%G3778><s%>

<S%G1410><s%> For Could <S%G1063><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ointment <S%G3464><s%> Have Been Sold <S%G4097><s%> For Much, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Have Been Given <S%G1325><s%> To The Poor. <S%G4434><s%>

<S%G1097><s%> But Knowing This <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Trouble <S%G2873><s%> Do Ye Cause <S%G3930><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Woman? <S%G1135><s%> <S%G2041><s%> For A Work <S%G1063><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> She Wrought <S%G2038><s%> Towards <S%G1519><s%> Me. <S%G1691><s%>

Always <S%G3842><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Poor <S%G4434><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> '' With <S%G3326><s%> You, <S%G1438><s%> <S%G1691><s%> But Me <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Ye Have. <S%G2192><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> From <S%G575><s%> That Time <S%G5119><s%> He Sought <S%G2212><s%> An Opportunity <S%G2120><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> He Might Deliver Up. <S%G3860><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> Now On The <S%G1161><s%> First Day <S%G4413><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Unleavened Bread <S%G106><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Wilt Thou That <S%G2309><s%> We Should Prepare <S%G2090><s%> For Thee <S%G4671><s%> To Eat <S%G5315><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover? <S%G3957><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Unto <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Such A One, <S%G1170><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Teacher <S%G1320><s%> Says, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2540><s%> My Time <S%G3450><s%> Near <S%G1451><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Thee <S%G4571><s%> I Will Keep <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Passover <S%G3957><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> My Disciples. <S%G3450><s%>

<S%G3798><s%> And Evening <S%G1161><s%> Being Come <S%G1096><s%> He Reclined At Table <S%G345><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>
